docs.text: Vuki An open source cloud platform based on: ovn aws firecracker Roadmap Version 0.1 Convert a linux node (virtual or bare metal) to a cloud IaaS Manage microVms through vuki cli Manage switches and attach vms to the switches in open vSwitch Attach public ip to microvms and get access to manage through ssh or something else Contributing To contribute to Vuki contact with me at alizowghi [@] gmail [.] com
